DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : SAN CLEMENTE ; TEEN TO COMPETE IN MAGAZINE CONTEST
DOC.TEXT: Monique Huey of San Clemente High_School has been named a finalist in ' Teen Magazine ' s 1994 Miss Teenage America program . Huey , 16 , will be among 12 finalists competing for the title of Miss Teenage America during events running today through Thursday in Los Angeles . More_than 10 # 000 girls between the ages of 13 and 18 entered the annual competition from around the nation . Finalists were selected based on scholastic achievement , general awareness , individual accomplishments , community service , poise and personality . Established in 1961 , the competition is designed to recognize the country ' s outstanding young_women . The winner , to be named Wednesday at the Hotel Nikko in Beverly Hills , will receive a $ 15 # 000 college scholarship , a monthly column in the magazine and the opportunity to travel as spokeswoman for several companies that sponsor the contest .
